titles.title: Prostate Cancer Misdiagnosis Elimination Act of 2017
Prostate Cancer Misdiagnosis Elimination Act of 2017
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage under the Medicare program of certain DNA Specimen Provenance Assay clinical diagnostic laboratory tests.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Prostate Cancer Misdiagnosis Elimination Act of 2017 This bill provides for Medicare coverage of a DNA Specimen Provenance Assay clinical diagnostic laboratory test following a positive prostate cancer biopsy.
